special_abilities.name: Axiomatic Mind.
descriptions: The quadrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

special_abilities.name: Disintegration.
descriptions: If the quadrone dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The quadrone makes two fist attacks or four shortbow attacks.

actions.name: Fist.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Shortbow.
descriptions: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
